SELECT a.id, a.user_id, f.id as "actionId", f.`name` as "actionName", a.coupon_id, a. STATUS, a.add_time, a.used_time, a.order_id, b.`nickname` AS "name", c.order_amount AS "orderAmount", d.coupon_name, d.coupon_type AS "type", d.coupon_money, f.expiration_date AS 'expirationTime' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user a
WHERE 1=1
AND a.coupon_id=#{couponId}
AND a.order_id=#{orderId}
AND b.nickname like '%'||#{name}||'%' CONCAT('%',#{name}, '%')
AND a.status=#{status}
AND b.mobile=#{mobile}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.used_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.used_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{lastTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.expiration_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startExpirationTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.expiration_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{lastExpirationTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY a.add_time DESC

SELECT a.id as "mxId", a.user_id as "userId", d.nickname as "name", d.mobile as "mobile", a.coupon_id as "couponId", c.coupon_name as "couponName", c.coupon_money as "couponAmount", CASE c.used_type WHEN 1 THEN '全部商品' WHEN 2 THEN '指定分类' ELSE '指定商品' END as "usedType", CASE a.`status` WHEN 0 THEN '未使用' WHEN 1 THEN '已使用' ELSE '已过期' END as "excelStatus", DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as "addDate", DATE_FORMAT(a.used_time,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as "usedDate", a.order_id as "orderId", b.order_amount as "orderMoney", b.order_status AS "orderStatus", f.id as "actionId", f.`name` as "actionName", DATE_FORMAT(f.expiration_date,"%Y-%m-%d %T") as "expirationDate" FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_orders b ON a.order_id=b.order_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon c ON a.coupon_id=c.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users d ON d.user_id=a.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity f ON f.id=c.action_id WHERE 1=1
AND a.coupon_id=#{couponId}
AND a.order_id=#{orderId}
AND d.nickname like '%'||#{name}||'%' CONCAT('%',#{name}, '%')
AND a.status=#{status}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.used_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.used_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{lastTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.expiration_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startExpirationTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.expiration_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{lastExpirationTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY a.add_time DESC
SELECT a.user_id, a.coupon_id, a.status, a.add_time, a.used_time, a.order_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user a WHERE a.order_id=#{orderId}

SELECT c.id as "actionId", c.`name` as "actionName", b.id as "counponId", b.coupon_name as "counponName", b.coupon_type as "type", b.used_type as "usedType", b.base_amount as "baseAmount", b.coupon_money as "couponMoney" FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon b ON a.coupon_id=b.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity c ON c.id=b.action_id WHERE a.`status`=1 AND a.order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user ( user_id, coupon_id, status, add_time, expiration_date, used_time, order_id, order_price )SELECT s.mtmy_user_id, #{couponId}, '0', SYSDATE(), (CASE WHEN (SELECT a.expiration_type FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon ac LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity a ON a.id = ac.action_id WHERE ac.id = #{couponId}) = 0 THEN (SELECT a.expiration_date FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon ac LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity a ON a.id = ac.action_id WHERE ac.id = #{couponId}) ELSE (DATE_FORMAT(date_add(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL (SELECT a.expiration_day FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon ac LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity a ON a.id = ac.action_id WHERE ac.id = #{couponId}) DAY),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')) END ), NULL, NULL, NULL FROM trains.sys_user s,mtmydb.mtmy_users u WHERE s.mtmy_user_id = u.user_id AND s.del_flag = 0 AND u.del_flag = 0 AND s.mtmy_user_id NOT IN ( SELECT user_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user WHERE coupon_id = #{couponId} GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(1) >= (SELECT ceiling FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon WHERE id = #{couponId}) )

INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user ( user_id, coupon_id, status, add_time, expiration_date, used_time, order_id, order_price )SELECT u.user_id, #{couponId}, '0', SYSDATE(), (CASE WHEN (SELECT a.expiration_type FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon ac LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity a ON a.id = ac.action_id WHERE ac.id = #{couponId}) = 0 THEN (SELECT a.expiration_date FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon ac LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity a ON a.id = ac.action_id WHERE ac.id = #{couponId}) ELSE (DATE_FORMAT(date_add(SYSDATE(),INTERVAL (SELECT a.expiration_day FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon ac LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity a ON a.id = ac.action_id WHERE ac.id = #{couponId}) DAY),'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')) END ), NULL, NULL, NULL FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users u WHERE u.del_flag = 0 AND u.user_id NOT IN ( SELECT user_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user WHERE coupon_id = #{couponId} GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(1) >= (SELECT ceiling FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon WHERE id = #{couponId})) AND u.user_id NOT IN ( SELECT u.mtmy_user_id FROM trains.sys_user u,mtmydb.mtmy_users u1 WHERE u.mtmy_user_id = u1.user_id AND u1.del_flag = 0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM trains.sys_user s,mtmydb.mtmy_users u WHERE s.mtmy_user_id = u.user_id AND s.del_flag = 0 AND u.del_flag = 0
